tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The Introduction is always second for LiveLabs. The title and contents menu title match for the Introduction.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup Visual Studio Code
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to download, install, and setup VS Code

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup GitHub Copilot in Visual Studio Code
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to setup GitHub Copilot, an MCP client, with VS Code

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Setup GenDev MCP server
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to download the GenDev MCP python package from the OCI Sandbox environment, connect to the Oracle autonomous database in the OCI Sandbox environment, and launch the GenDev MCP server from VS Code

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Start building the application with Modules
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to develop your application using the GenDev methodology by first generating the modules of the application

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Generate the Data Access APIs
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to generate and customize the data access APIs of the application modules

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Generate the database objects
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to generate the database objects to satisfy the data access APIs, visualize the entity-relationship diagram, and create those objects on the autonomous database

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Generate the app business logic and frontend
Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
